S

save() - Static method in class Phonebook
This method is to save the elements in the array in a file at hard.it loops on the elements of the array which represent objects and call getter methods to get the value of all six fields of this contacts and then write them in a file splitted by ",".
search() - Static method in class Phonebook
This method is to search for a contact by first name ,last name or Phone number so it asks the user to type his selection then asks him to write the String he wants to search for related his selection,after that it loops on the array to search for contact which contains this String (ignoring letters case) and counts the matched contacts .finally it calls the method of printing to print all matched results.Also it prints the number of matched contacts and the order of each contact in the array which represents (its index+1).
setAddress(String) - Method in class Contact
This is a setter method which sets the value of the parameter(address).
setEmail(String) - Method in class Contact
This is a setter method which sets the value of the parameter(email).
setFirstName(String) - Method in class Contact
This is a setter method which sets the value of the parameter(fistName).
setLastName(String) - Method in class Contact
This is a setter method which sets the value of the parameter(lastName).
setNote(String) - Method in class Contact
This is a setter method which sets the value of the parameter(note).
setPhoneNum(String) - Method in class Contact
This is a setter method which sets the value of the parameter(phoneNum).
